      public static void changeDescriptionCol()

      public static void changeStartEndToTimestamp()
      SQL query to update the "Start" and "End" columns of the database

    • updateEntries

      public static void updateEntries()
      SQL query to update the default values in the database, so that customer's addresses are used as the location for all apps

    • convertToUTC

      public static LocalDateTime convertToUTC(LocalDateTime systemLocalDateTime)
      A method to convert from a DateTime from the local TimeZone to UTC TimeZone
      Parameters:
      systemLocalDateTime - A DateTime in the user's local timezone, as determined by the system's settings
      Returns:
      The DateTime of the user-inputted value, converted into UTC timezone

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()

      A list of all appointments in the database

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(Appointment app)
      Parameters:
      app - The appointment to delete from the database

    • getContactName

      public static String getContactName(int contactId)
      Parameters:
      contactId - The ID of the contact to look up
      Returns:
      The name of the contact that has the inputted ID

    • getNextId

      public static int getNextId()
      Returns:
      the ID that will be used for the next added Appointment (used to populate the ID field of the "Add Appointment" screen)

    • getLastResultSet

      public static ResultSet getLastResultSet()
      Returns:
      the last Appointment added to the database

    • checkForOverlap

      public static String checkForOverlap(int appId, String customerName, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Parameters:
      appId - The ID of the appointment that the user is attempting to Add/Modify
      customerName - The name of the customer that the appointment is for
      start - The start DateTime of the appointment
      end - The end DateTime of the appointment
      Returns:
      A String indicating if the appointment overlaps w/ any others ("OVERLAP" or not "CLEAR)

    • getAppointmentTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAppointmentTypes()
      Returns:
      A list of all appointment types

    • getAppTypeCount

      public static int getAppTypeCount(String type)
      Parameters:
      type - An appointment type to look up
      Returns:
      The number of appointments in the database of the given type

    • getAppMonths

      public static ArrayList<ArrayList<String>> getAppMonths()
      Returns:
      An array containing sub-arrays that indicate the number of appointments in each month of the year(s)
